title: Potato wedges with rosemary
description: Potato wedges are the ultimate easy side dish - just slam them in the oven and forget about them until hunger strikes.

default: coarse salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Wash and dry the potatoes, but don't peel them. Cut the potatoes into large wedges and place into a bowl.
Add the remaining ingredients to the bowl and mix well. Tip the potatoes onto a baking tray.
Transfer the potatoes to the oven and bake until golden-brown and cooked all the way through (about 30 minutes).
Serve the potatoes hot from the oven.
